:::Bludgeon/Bluestreak/Andromeda/Calibos/Skullcruncher:::

::Bludgeon salutes to Phobia::
Bludgeon: I will provide you cover in the air Phobia

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::The next morning Bluestreak walked to Andromeda's quarters and knocked on 
the door.  The walks out::
Andromeda: Oh, hi Bluestreak.
Bluestreak: Id like you to meet my friends.
Andromeda: Sure, if there all like you thay cant be bad at all.
Bluestreak: Um, uh, thanks.
::He walks her over to where Ratchet is working of the cave in::
Bluestreak: hey Ratchet, how ya doing up there?
Ratchet: Well it'll take a couple more Deca cycles, but im workin' on it.  
Whos the girl?
Bluestreak: Her names Andromeda, shes new.
Ratchet: Pleasure to meet ya Andromeda.
Andromeda: The pleasures all mine.
::They walk away to the outside::
Bluestreak: So, tell me about yourself Andromeda.
Andromeda: Well, back on Cybertron i was to be the lover of the Predacon 
General Calibos, but i did not want him.  After that, he stalked and killed 
everyone who ever loved me.
Bluestreak: God, thats terrible.
::He looked her over.  Her flaming orange wings, her perfect compliment of 
blue and yellow, those curves... He would die just to be with her for a short 
time::
Andromeda: Oh dont worry, hes got to be billions of klicks away by now...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
::Calibos and his follower, Skullcruncher, were headed for earth that very 
minute::
Calibos: So, Bluestreak, you seem to like Andromeda a lot.  Well, we'll see 
about that!
